mapper.select: select cmno, title, userid, regdate, views, thumbup from community order by cmno desc limit #{cnum}, 20
mapper.insert: insert into community (title, userid, contents, fnames, fsizes, uuid) values (#{title}, #{userid}, #{contents}, #{fnames}, #{fsizes}, #{uuid})
mapper.update: update community set views = views + 1 where cmno = #{cmno}
mapper.select: select fnames from community where cmno = #{cmno}
select fsizes from community where cmno = #{cmno}
select AUTO_INCREMENT-1 cmno from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_NAME = 'community';

select cmno, title, userid, regdate, views, thumbup from community where ${ftype} like concat(#{fkey}, '%') where title like concat(#{fkey}, '%') or contents like concat(#{fkey}, '%') order by cmno desc limit #{snum}, 20
select count(cmno) cnt from community where ${ftype} like concat(#{fkey}, '%') where title like concat(#{fkey}, '%') or contents like concat(#{fkey}, '%')
